editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Book of Order of the Disciples, መጽሐፈ: ሥርዓቶሙ: ለሐዋርያት, incipit, በስመ: አብ: ወወልድ: ዝንቱ: መጽሐፈ: ሥርዓቶሙ ለሐዋርያት: ወባዕዳንሂ: እም: ፸ ወ ፱ አርድዕት: ንኡሳን: ወዘኮነ: ኵሎ: እምዜናሆሙ:, arranged in eighteen sections: section 1, introduction, f-14v; section 2, about Peter, f-20v; section 3, about Simon, son of Cleapas, f-23v; section 4, about James, the brother of Jesus, f-29v; section 5, about Bartholomew, f-39r; section 6, about Matthew, the Evangelist, f-51r; section 7, about Luke, the evangelist, f-55r); section 8, about Philip, the Apostle, f-63r; section 9, about Andrew, the Apostle, f-73r; section 10, about Andrew and Bartholomew, f-90r; section 11, about Andrew, f-93r; section 12, about John, the Evangelist, f-113r; section 13, about James, son of Alpheas, f-114v; section 14, about Matthias, the Apostle, f-127v; section 15, about James, son of Zebedee, brother of John, f-133r; section 16, about Mark, the Evangelist, f-137r; section 17, about Thomas, the Apostle, f-154v.; section 18, about Jude, the brother of Jesus, and Thaddeus, the Apostle, , incomplete at the end.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
